attributes.action: Make abortion clinics more easily accessible to everyone
attributes.additional_details: In Bristol there are only two abortion clinics, both out of the way to many people, so people who don't drive would have to get the bus to and from the clinic if they live far away. Imagine living in the countryside, and how difficult it would be to access a clinic if you need one.
attributes.background: Everyone has their own views on abortion. Some people believe that abortions are wrong, but in many cases women feel the need to have an abortion because of personal experiences and i believe it should be their choice.
